content: Want to but I can't help it, I love the way it feels. It's got me stuck between my fantasy and what is real. I need it when I want it, I want it when I don't. Tell myself I'll stop everyday, knowin' that I won't. I got a problem and I don't know what to do about it, even if I did I don't know if I would quit. But, I doubt it. I'm taken by the thought of it. And I know this much is true. Baby, you have become my addiction. I'm so strung out on you, I can barely move. But, I like it. And it's all because of you.
author: Ne-Yo
